name: COG site found!
text: Our scouts have picked up a radio signal coming from a COG site, we must decide what we want to do with it.

choices.text: Give them what they deserve, a sacrifical death. Like the people they swore they protected.
Enslave them, like the dogs they are.
Kill them all, loot their weapons, there will be no sacrifice this time.

name: A Forbidden Knowledge.
text: Our scouts have found a Black Book in an old vault.

choices.text: Is this the Forbidden Knowledge our people so desire?
